about_the_game:
A 56-page official artbook for Red Embrace: Hollywood, featuring sketches, alternate versions, comments on the design process, and more!

The digital book comes in PDF format, and can be opened via web browser or Adobe Reader.

Featured sections:
  • Backgrounds
  • Sprites
  • CGs
  • Extra (fanart, programmer art, revision marks)

Instructions:
  • Right click Red Embrace: Hollywood (must be installed) in your Steam Library and select "Properties".
  • Under the "Local Files" tab, select “Browse Local Files”.
  • Open "Artbook.pdf" in the main folder.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Red Embrace: Hollywood - Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
